definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
arrogant appearance/smug appearance/to act condescending/to put on airs

sentences.english: He is riding high now, but I think this won’t be long.
sentences.chinese: 他現在神氣十足，但我認爲不會長久如此。

sentences.english: My boss is a stuffed shirt, bragging all the time.
sentences.chinese: 我的老闆神氣十足，整天在吹噓。

sentences.english: I think, evergreen, as air, will definitely be a strong vitality.
sentences.chinese: 我想，萬年青那樣神氣，生命力一定會很強。

sentences.english: Listless game on the small girls in the United States, consistent with the proud, beautiful and arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 神氣的小美妞，帶着一貫的驕傲，美麗而高傲。

sentences.english: She was prancing along in her new outfit .
sentences.chinese: 她穿着全套新衣服神氣活現地走着。

sentences.english: He had the air of soldier standing at ease.
sentences.chinese: 他那神氣活象一位稍息着的士兵。

sentences.english: The Bishop gazed at her with an air of amazement.
sentences.chinese: 主教顯出一副驚奇的神氣瞧着她。

sentences.english: A parvenu swaggers by oneself at a party.
sentences.chinese: 有個暴發戶在舞會上神氣活現地四處走動。

sentences.english: She walks past us dawn her nose in the waterdrop.
sentences.chinese: 她從咱們身旁走過，神氣得鼻孔朝天。

sentences.english: It was amusing to notice how the consequential Jones was already beginning to give himself airs on the strength of the capture.
sentences.chinese: 這時傲慢的瓊斯已逐漸露出他對囚犯大擺威嚴的神氣。

sentences.english: He had not become a trim self-satisfied city man .
sentences.chinese: 他沒有變成一個衣冠楚楚，神氣十足的城裏人。

sentences.english: The cocky lordly dogs like the neon lamps over the streets.
sentences.chinese: 神氣活現的狗猶如滿街的霓虹燈。

sentences.english: Since Dr. Hsu seems to be a stuffed shirt, I try to avoid him.
sentences.chinese: 由於徐醫生神氣巴拉，我對他避而遠之。

sentences.english: He really cuts a dash in his smart new uniform .
sentences.chinese: 他穿着漂亮的新制服真是神氣十足。

sentences.english: Their overbearing bureaucracy and their self-satisfied airs are really more than one can stand.
sentences.chinese: 他們那種神氣十足的官僚架子實在叫人喫不消。

sentences.english: He with his hatchet men swaggered out of the bar.
sentences.chinese: 他和他那幫打手神氣活現地走出了那間酒吧。

definition: healthy environment/healthy atmosphere/righteousness/vital energy (in Chinese medicine)
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
to get it straight/to start to understand things properly/enlightenment dawns
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
to open one's eyes/to widen one's horizons
